trans-unit.source: Represents the execution environment of an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
This class cannot be inherited.
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Represents the execution environment of an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>.
This class selectively exposes workflow runtime capabilities and services to individual activities.
trans-unit.target: 此类有选择性地公开工作流运行时功能和服务添加到单个活动。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
[!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] [Understanding the Activity Execution Context](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/60a032ef-4c51-482f-9aa8-fce406856b29).
Gets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> that currently executes within this execution context.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> ，当前在此执行上下文中执行。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> associated to this execution context.
This instance is marked for garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 此实例标记为垃圾回收。

trans-unit.source: Called by a composite activity to schedule the cancellation of a child activity.
trans-unit.target: 调用由复合活动安排子活动的取消。

trans-unit.source: The workflow runtime disallows cancellation of a child activity that is not in the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Executing"></xref> state.
trans-unit.target: 工作流运行时禁止取消子活动不在<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Executing"></xref>状态。

trans-unit.source: The canceled <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
activity is .
activity is not a valid child of the .

This means that either the argument is equal to the associated <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.Activity*> or that the argument is not in the commented state and is a child of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.Activity*> associated with this <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着两个参数是否等于关联<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.Activity*>或者参数未处于注释状态并且是的子级<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.Activity*>与此关联<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> has been disposed.
activity is not in the state.
Indicates to the workflow runtime that the currently executing activity should transition to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Closed"></xref> state.
trans-unit.target: 指示当前正在执行的活动应转换为工作流运行时<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Closed"></xref>状态。

trans-unit.source: The status of the associated <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.Activity*> is not equal to <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Executing"></xref> or <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Canceling"></xref> or <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Compensating"></xref> or <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Closed"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 关联的状态<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.Activity*>是否不等于<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Executing"></xref>或<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Canceling"></xref>或<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Compensating"></xref>或<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Closed"> </xref>。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.Activity*>

trans-unit.source: The disposed <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref>.
Gets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ContextID" name="ContextID" href=""></xref> of the associated <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref uid="langword_csharp_ContextID" name="ContextID" href=""></xref>的关联<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_ContextID" name="ContextID" href=""></xref> of the associated <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
Represents an exception that has occurred during the execution of the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 表示在工作流实例的执行过程中发生的异常。

trans-unit.source: This property has a value only when an activity is in the faulting state.
trans-unit.target: 只有当活动处于出错状态时，此属性具有值。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Called by a composite activity to schedule the execution of a child activity.
trans-unit.target: 调用由复合活动，用于计划子活动的执行。

trans-unit.source: The workflow runtime disallows execution of a child activity that is not in the initialized state.
trans-unit.target: 工作流运行时不允许执行未处于初始化状态的子活动。

trans-unit.source: If the status is <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Closed>, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> is initialized and executed.
trans-unit.target: 如果状态为<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Closed>、<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>会被初始化并执行。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Closed>

trans-unit.source: The executed <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
activity is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: activity为空引用 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: activity is not a valid child of the .

This means that either the argument is equal to the associated <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.Activity*> or that the argument is not in the commented state and is a child of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.Activity*> associated with this <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着两个参数是否等于关联<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.Activity*>或者参数未处于注释状态并且是的子级<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.Activity*>与此关联<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The status is neither initialized nor <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Closed"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> has been disposed.
Gets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContextManager"></xref> associated with this instance.
the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContextManager"></xref> associated with this instance.
Returns a service of the specified type.
The <xref:System.Type> of the service.
A service <xref:System.Object> of the specified <xref:System.Type>.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> has been disposed.
To be added.
Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref>.
Invokes the track method for the associated <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.Activity*>.
The tracking routine is defined as part of the interface provided by each activity.
trans-unit.target: 跟踪例程定义为由每个活动提供的接口的一部分。

trans-unit.source: See comment in user-supplied custom code.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅用户提供自定义代码中的注释。

trans-unit.source: An object that specifies the data to track.
trans-unit.target: 一个指定要跟踪的数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: If userData is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 如果 userData 为空引用 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> associated with this instance is a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref>).
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>关联与此实例为空引用 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref>)。

trans-unit.source: Invokes the track method for the associated <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.Activity*>.
The tracking routine is defined as part of the interface provided by each activity.
trans-unit.target: 跟踪例程定义为由每个活动提供的接口的一部分。

trans-unit.source: It is user supplied custom code.
trans-unit.target: 它是用户提供自定义代码。

trans-unit.source: The member of `userData` to track.
The data to track.
If userData is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 如果 userData 为空引用 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> associated with this instance is a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref>).
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>关联与此实例为空引用 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref>)。
